scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run prisma:generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node src/index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development prisma generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon src/index.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test && npm run prisma:generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js
